website_summaries.verdict: The Blue Satellite headphones delivers an excellent Bluetooth audio experience and solid noise cancellation, but some operational issues hold them back.
pros: Powerful audio performance with built-in analog amplifier
Can be used in wired, passive mode
cons: Occasional interference issues in wireless mode
Noise-cancellation circuitry can alter wired audio playback slightly
Bulky design can exert too much pressure on jawline, scalp

customer_reviews.title: Good but lacking
customer_reviews.text: Good sound sans noise cancellation - but with dedicated drivers for ANC, I expected better sound with ANC on.... Good construction, weird smelling fake leather on cans, cheap feeling fake leather for a $400 retail product No app to control is a minus in this day and age Buttons have no audio feedback when pressed.. I did memorize locations of buttons so no biggie but some might mind Did not feel like a good value only because I have better sounding wired headphones from master and dynamic and already have Bluetooth wireless ath m50x bt so this one needed to shine on ANC, which it unfortunately does not
customer_reviews.author: Krísh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones come in a very nice box that says quality the hardshell case is top quality. After the initial 3 hr charge of the battery I put them on and tried them out and I was not disappointed the music was clear and sounded so good then I turned the ANC and Amp on and could not believe that a wireless headphone could be so loud. They are very well built with no plastic all leather and metal they just look and feel amazing I have always wanted a good quality pair of cans and with Blue Satellite I have that for the price I paid for these headphones are worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Earl Wines III

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but quality control needs to be improved
customer_reviews.text: Bought the second pair by now. Great sound. Great ergonomis/design. Should be 5 stars. But quality control need to be improved, especially the controls. In my first one (black) the volume control stopped working after 2 weeks only occasional use. So I bought a second pair (black). That’s why only 4 stars So far the second pair functions, except that the tiny on/off button needs to be pushed quite energic/hard/long in order to function. The on/off button in the first pair was easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Ganie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound- Too heavy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Sound fabulous..But so heavy and tight they are virtually unuseable.
customer_reviews.author: Anders

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price point, get on sale
customer_reviews.text: Bad battery life, and ok listening experience for the price. Controls are clunky
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Love

customer_reviews.title: If you lik you4 music loud you will love these
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I own. I have at least 5 hig( end pairs. I love the built in amplifier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and comfort, slight issue with holding a charge. Just my experience maybe user error.
customer_reviews.author: Theo32

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality comfortable , great sound , definitely will be looking at other products from blue
customer_reviews.author: arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great just more bass needed
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely beautiful looking and sounding headphones but I believe for $400+ there should be extra bass drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Ming Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones with a critical flaw.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones sound amazing and are *somewhat* comfortable, yet the one feature that I required and assumed that would be included (and that might be the same for you) is an auto-off feature. Every time you stop using the headphones you have to hold down the power button for three seconds for the headphones to actually turn off. If you are like me and won't remember that every single time, you'll end up using these as wired headphones, which I don't want and I will therefore be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel G.

customer_reviews.title: no not at all it did not impress me, ...
customer_reviews.text: no not at all it did not impress me, the amplifier was a gimmick I don't believe it work, and there was a feature that wasn't compatible with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why would you spend $200 more on an inferior set of cans?
customer_reviews.text: As a metalhead, great sound quality and high volume appeals to me. These are easily the loudest bluetooth headphones I have ever heard. Louder than sennheiser and bose even before you turn on the amp. Once you turn on the amp the magic starts. At full volume the music is still crystal clear and sounds perfect. I can only listen to it at full volume for 10 minutes or so before I have to turn it down. These are like sennheiser on steroids. Easily the best sound quality. Only complaint is a little interference when phone is in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: ll

customer_reviews.title: faulty build quality
customer_reviews.text: for the price I was hoping for something built better but after only two months of having these the plastic above the earpiece failed when I went to put them on. You'd hope for almost 200$ they'd hold up better than a 20$ headset.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BASS GREAT MIDS AND VERY SWEET HI'S
customer_reviews.text: ANGELO BENITEZ PUERTO RICO, THE BLUE SATELITE HEADPHONE SYSTEM IS A HI-END STUDIO MONITOR IN YOUR EARS. THE DEFINITION ON THE MUSIC IS EXELENT, YOU HEAR EVERY DETAIL AND VOLUME WISE IS BALANCE OVERALL, GREAT BASS GREAT MIDS AND VERY SWEET HI'S. THE QUALITY OF THE PRODUCT BLUE DELIVERS ITS WORTH EVERY PENNY. AGAIN A HI-END HEADPHONE SYSTEM YOU WILL LOVE EVERY TIME YOU USE THEM,
customer_reviews.author: ANGELO BENITEZ

customer_reviews.title: No waranty
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a gift in March 2020, in Oct 2020 both the ANC and AMP stopped working. When I contacted Blue for the "2 year warranty" I was given excuses. Once I jumped all the loops to meet their demands for the warranty. They told me that its a discontinued product they do not support anymore. In other words, their 2 year warranty is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: A. CabreraTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Blue Satellite Premium Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones with Audiophile Amp (Black)
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely an impressive set of headphones, the price is just a bit out there. If you don't like earbuds, these are definitely an option for someone who's an audiophile.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: just heard my music for the first time.
customer_reviews.text: I truly didn't hear my music until I got these heads. So so in love with them. The extra amp just kicks the bass like hell.
customer_reviews.author: 2 Shay

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY AND BEAUTY - A MASTERPIECE OF STYLE AND RETRO FUTURE DESIGN.
customer_reviews.text: it’s not about just qualitty, but about QUALITY + BEAUTY. Style, extra quality premium materials and a memorable performance make those headphones the state of art for audiophiles and perfectionists around the world. Absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RICARDO

customer_reviews.title: 🔥🔥🔥🔥
customer_reviews.text: These are loud 😎🔥 also at first use they was tight on my head but have recently loosened up and feel great the leather on them is soft 🔥 the most impressive thing on these are they sound threw some lucero rock and whoa
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones; a bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are great, excellent sound quality, noise cancellation works well, good range of Bluetooth functionality and long battery life. The only drawback: pricey, but then quality ain't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence R. Bachmann

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Blue got it right. Love the sound and look as you would expect from Blue but the noise cancelling effectiveness and comfort were just what I was looking for in a wireless headphone for long flights. Great job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highest Quality.
customer_reviews.text: These have extraordinarily good sound. They also cancel ambient sound better than any headset I have tried, and I have tried several. The range is good, the clarity superb.
customer_reviews.author: P.  McCormack

product_meta.title: Blue Satellite Premium Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones with Audiophile Amp (Black), (7105)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe New Benchmark for Wireless Listening. For 20 years, the world’s greatest artists have used Blue in the studio. Now Blue has created a wireless over-ear headphone that lets you hear more of your favorite music, everywhere you go. Satellite combines legendary Blue sound quality with all-new patent pending active noise cancelling (ANC) technology to ensure your music is never compromised. Together with premium wireless technology and a built-in audiophile amp, Satellite is a new benchmark for the modern listening experience.
feature_bullets: Patent pending 4-driver system featuring custom 44mm ultra-responsive drivers for audio and dedicated 30mm drivers for ANC
Built-in audiophile amplifier for rich, dynamic and detailed sound
Battery life up to 24 hours with Bluetooth only or 8 hours with Bluetooth, ANC and Amp
Foldable construction for easy portability and storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars50 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
